import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import getCartAction from '../Store/Action/Get_Cart_Action' const Checkout = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() let getCartdata = useSelector(state => state.GetCartReducer?.cartItem) || {} let requireddetail = getCartdata.map((item) => { return { ...item.productData } }) console.log(requireddetail) useEffect(() => { getCartAction(dispatch, {}) }, []) return ( <>

order summary

{requireddetail ? requireddetail.map((curr, index) => { return (
{curr?.Title} {curr.Title} {curr?.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal} {curr?.Price?.current_store_price?.$numberDecimal}
) }) : null}
Total Amount ₹200.00
Shipping Free
Final Amount ₹200.00
) } export default Checkout
